sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-app-bar app>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      <v-toolbar-title>Application</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" app>
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>
                ITLaguna
              </v-list-item-title>
              <v-list-item-subtitle>
                Proyecto Pila Completa 1
              </v-list-item-subtitle>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>
          <v-list dense>
            <v-list-item
              v-for="(item, i) in items"
              :key="i"
              :value="item"
              :to="item.link"
              link
              active-color="primary"
            >
              <template v-slot:prepend>
                <v-icon :icon="item.icon"></v-icon>
              </template>
              <v-list-item-title v-text="item.title"></v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-card-text>
      </v-card>
    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid>
        <router-view></router-view>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    drawer: null,
    items: [
      { title: 'Inicio', icon: 'mdi-home', link: '/' },
      { title: 'Añadir post', icon: 'mdi-note-plus', link: '/add-post' },
      { title: 'Acerca De', icon: 'mdi-help-box', link: '/about' },
    ],
  }),
};
</script>

<style>
/* Ajustar el espacio entre el v-app-bar y el v-navigation-drawer */
.v-navigation-drawer {
  margin-top: 64px;
}

/* Ajustar el tamaño del v-navigation-drawer */
.v-navigation-drawer .v-list-item {
  min-height: 48px;
}

/* Ajustar el tamaño y la posición del cuadro blanco */
.v-navigation-drawer .v-card {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 64px;
  padding: 12px;
  background-color: white;
}

/* Ajustar el espacio entre el nav lateral y el contenido principal */
.v-main {
  margin-left: 300px; /* Ajusta este valor según sea necesario */
}
</style>
